$D600 = %0 1101 0110 0000 0000 = $06 $B0
$D680 = %0 1101 0110 0010 0000 = $06 $B4
$D700 = %0 1101 0110 0100 0000 = $06 $B8
$D780 = %0 1101 0110 0110 0000 = $06 $BC

$D800 = %0 1101 0110 1000 0000 = $06 $C0 Spin 0
$DA00 = %0 1101 1000 1000 0000 = $06 $D0 Spin 1
$DC00 = %0 1101 1010 1000 0000 = $06 $E0 Dice 2
$DE00 = %0 1101 1100 1000 0000 = $06 $F0 Dice 3
$E000 = %0 1101 1110 1000 0000 = $07 $10 Dice 4
$E200 = %0 1110 0000 1000 0000 = $07 $20 Dice 5
$E400 = %0 1110 0010 1000 0000 = $07 $30 Dice 6
$E600 = %0 1110 0100 1000 0000 = $07 $40 Dice 7

0 = $5000 - $5007
1 = $5008 - $500F
2 = $5010 - $5017
3 = $5018 - $501F
4 = $5020 - $5027
5 = $5028 - $502F
